name: Ice Cube
ability_description: Ice block freezes enemy, and its damage is reduced by 5%, taken damage increases by 50% for 3 turns, stuns enemy for 1 turn (usable 1 time)
ability_long_description: Ice block freezes enemy, and enemys damage is reduced by 5%, taken damage increases by 50% for 3 turns, stuns enemy for 1 turn (usable only once)
